originalText.text:
First time customer, first time for several of the services I had done.
Sebastian is a great therapist.  He reviewed all of what I wanted, told me what to expect, and checked in as we went along.
Thanks to Sebastian’s excellent work,  I left feeling super groomed and clean.  Which was the objective.  As a bonus, he’s very friendly.  I highly recommend both the business and therapist.  Especially if it’s something you’ve wanted done but have been putting off.  (Also, for this type of service, male therapists for an all male clientele made me more comfortable than mixed.)

originalText.text:
I've been a loyal client of MPM Studio for years, and let me tell you, this place is nothing short of amazing. Specializing in hair removal by sugaring, they've mastered the art to perfection. The entire process is smooth, practically pain-free, and leaves my skin feeling silky and rejuvenated.

The atmosphere at MPM is cozy, welcoming, and impeccably clean, making every visit feel like a mini retreat. From the moment I walk through the door, I'm greeted with friendly faces and top-notch professionalism.

Now, let's talk about the staff: Geo, Oskar, Andres, and Luis are all absolutely fantastic. Each one brings their unique touch and expertise to the table, making sure that my experience is personalized and comfortable every single time. Their skill and attention to detail are evident, and they genuinely care about their clients' satisfaction.

If you're considering hair removal services, I can't recommend MPM Studio enough. The consistent quality and outstanding service have made me a client for life. Five stars all the way!

originalText.text: My first visit was in March this year, and I really had great service and experience. However, today was different. The room was extra cold compared to last time, and I wish there was some alternative for customers to feel comfortable. I had Sebastian, and it seemed like he was unprofessional. My satisfaction began dipped, the staff being late and taking time to prepare. He did not fully provide information for post waxing care, and it was especially hurting more. I was really surprised about the room hygiene as the towel was covered with hair before I used it. I strongly suggest applying more techniques to make the customers less painful, like covering the waxed bit with hands right after it.

originalText.text: I have never had a sugaring service done before. I had been wanting to try it for a while, and I am so glad that I have now experienced it. The pain was unnoticeable and found it to be relaxing because Geo, the technician, did such a good job at ensuring I was comfortable. And after just a few days, I love the feeling. I cannot wait to have this service again.

originalText.text: Went for my first time to try sugaring and laser.  Oskar was so professional, funny and engaging.  He made the experience as assuring as possible and the results were excellent!  Would recommend Oskar and MPM to anyone looking to try something new down there.
